mapper.select: select id,post_id,author_id,author_name,channel_id,comments,created,favors,featured,status,summary,tags, thumbnail,title,views,weight from blog_post where id=#{id}
select id,post_id,author_id,author_name,channel_id,comments,created,favors,featured,status,summary,tags, thumbnail,title,views,weight from blog_post where title=#{name}
select id,post_id,author_id,author_name,channel_id,comments,created,favors,featured,status,summary,tags, thumbnail,title,views,weight from blog_post where author_id=#{authorId}
mapper.delete: delete blog_post,post_tag from blog_post left join post_tag on blog_post.post_id = post_tag.post_id where blog_post.post_id=#{postId}
